name: This Ain't No Game
description:
This Ain't No Game is a humorous text-adventure "game" about a guy trying to not make a game for a Game Jam.

I made this "game" for the Non-Game Game Jam. And to be honest I made it on the very last day in a few hours. So it's pretty rushed, and kinda short.  But nonetheless there are five different endings to the game. 

This is my first ever Game Jam as well as the first time I have ever finished a "game". So it was a lot of stressful fun to be a part of this. I hope you guys at least get a laugh out of it.
